mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group Portrait of Storer College Class of 1924, Harpers Ferry, W. Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Smith, Harry, Studio, Martinsburg, W. Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Five 1924 graduates with Pres. (Dr.) McDonald. First Row: Madison S. Briscoe, Robt. S. Chase, Geo B. Toodle. Second Row: Florence A. Warfield, Dr. McDonald, Anna K. Campbell.
